[LOGIC]: Sudden shift from discussing Arthur Davis to broader linguistic revival without clear connection

[SYNTAX]: Overly complex sentence structures with nested clauses (e.g., "But let us take these passages at their nakedest...").

[TRANSITION]: Sudden shifts in tone and focus (e.g., from discussing "Song of Hate" to modern Englishwoman’s sentiment).

Confusing structure in "A chosen people is really a choosing people."
